price: (Hadir) kaa sε: “Nokorε sε wontumi nnya me ho aboterε“.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
